serverName.description: Defines the IP/hostname of the MariaDB service.

serverPort.description: Defines the listen port of the MariaDB service.

user.description: Defines the user name of the MariaDB service.

password.description: Defines the user password of the MariaDB service.

databaseName.description: Defines the database name of the MariaDB service.

crontab.description: Defines the scheduling expression (crontab format) for the backup.

backupDir.description: Defines the directory to store the backup files.
